recipe.title: Marinated Tomatoes Teruel
ingredients: 3 very large ripe tomatoes, cut into 1/2-inch-thick slices
1/4 cup Sherry wine vinegar or red wine vinegar
instructions: Arrange tomatoes in single layer in shallow dish. Combine oil and next 8 ingredients in medium bowl, stirring to blend well. Spoon dressing over tomatoes. Cover and marinate in refrigerator 3 hours. Divide tomato slices among 4 plates. Spoon dressing over. Garnish with parsley if desired and serve.
